TunableList.name: CAS_PREFERENCE_GROUPS
TunableList.description: The list of all preference groups.

Tunable.name: CAS_PREFERENCE_LIKE_RATE
Tunable.description: The rate of like preferences assigned at random in CAS (0: none, 1: all).

Tunable.name: CAS_PREFERENCE_MOLECULE_EMPTY_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description: The tooltip displayed over the preference molecule if the Sim does not have any set preferences.

Tunable.name: CAS_PREFERENCES_CATEGORY_TAB_ICON
Tunable.description: The icon shown in the Sim Preferences Selection Panel Tab for Categories.

Tunable.name: CAS_PREFERENCES_CATEGORY_TAB_ICON_SELECTED
Tunable.display: Cas Preferences Category Tab Icon Selected
Tunable.description: The icon shown in the Sim Preferences Selection Panel Tab for Categories.

Tunable.name: CAS_PREFERENCES_CATEGORY_TAB_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description: The tooltip string shown in the Sim Preferences Selection Panel Tab for Categories.

TunableList.name: DECORATOR_CAREER_PREFERENCE_CATEGORIES
TunableList.description: A list of preference categories that contain the set of preferences pulled from clients that create constraints for the GP10 Decorator Career.

Tunable.name: MAX_PREFERENCE_WARNING
Tunable.description: The string shown in the CAS when the Sim has reached the preference capacity.

Tunable.name: PREFERENCE_CAPACITY
Tunable.description: The preference limit on an object.

Tunable.name: PREFERENCE_SIM_PANEL_EMPTY
Tunable.description: The string shown in the Sim Preferences Panel when the Sim has no set preferences.

Tunable.name: RANDOMIZE_DIAG_TEXT
Tunable.description: The text within the warning dialog that is shown when traits are randomized.

Tunable.name: RANDOMIZE_DIAG_TITLE
Tunable.description: The title within the warning dialog that is shown when traits are randomized.

Tunable.name: RANDOMIZE_DIAG_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description: The tooltip string shown on the Randomize button in the Sim Preferences Selection Panel.
